name: ayaya-league-external
description: External script platform for League of Legends

scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run compile:cp && electron dist/index.js
scripts.build: cd src/components/winapi/cpp/ayaya-winapi && node-gyp clean configure build --target=20.0.1 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers

author: Emily
